title: 10 acres for sale
details:
Awesome 10 acre land close to Horana city is a chance not to be missed. Enjoy existing 5 acres of rubber plantation, 3 acres of tea plantation with 2 acres of bare land. The land has direct access to the road and have water, 3 phase electricity mostly suitable for factory.


> Total land size :10 acres
> Near to the Hayleys factory (pvt)
> 15 minutes to Horana city
> Water faclities
> 3 phase electricity line
> all clear deeds
> 6500000 Per Acre
